title: ToolConfig
description: Represents the complete configuration for a command-line tool.

guidance_key.description: Key to look up guidance in tool_guidance.json

input_schema.description: Generated input schema (optional - auto-generated from subcommands)

synchronous.description: Default synchronous behavior for all subcommands (can be overridden per subcommand)

timeout_seconds.description: Default timeout for operations in seconds

OptionConfig.description: Configuration for an option within a subcommand

file_arg.description:
If true, multi-line or special character values will be written to a temporary file
and the file path will be passed as the argument instead of the raw value.
The option name will be automatically converted to use the file flag variant
(e.g., for git commit: "message" with file_arg=true becomes "-F" instead of "-m")

file_flag.description:
When file_arg is true, this specifies the flag to use for file-based input
(e.g., "-F" for git commit). If not specified, defaults to the normal flag.

positional.description: If true, this option is treated as a positional argument rather than a flag.

SubcommandConfig.description: Configuration for a subcommand within a tool

enabled.description: Whether this subcommand is enabled (defaults to true)

guidance_key.description: Key to look up guidance in tool_guidance.json

subcommand.description: Nested subcommands for recursive command structures

synchronous.description: If true, this subcommand runs synchronously instead of async

timeout_seconds.description: Override timeout for this specific subcommand

ToolHints.description: A collection of hints for AI clients using this tool.

default.description: Default hint for any operation with this tool
